sentences.sContent: B;Of course ,we must give these checks to drawee bank to collect the funds they owe us .
sentences.sContent_eng: B;Of course ,we must give these checks to drawee bank to collect the funds they owe us .
sentences.sCn: 当然，我们必须把这些支票交给票据付款行，并且收回他们欠我们的资金。

sentences.sContent: Presentation, presentment: The collecting bank or the holder of a draft shows and hands over it to the drawee for acceptance or payment.
sentences.sContent_eng: Presentation, presentment: The collecting bank or the holder of a draft shows and hands over it to the drawee for acceptance or payment.
sentences.sCn: 提示代收行或持票人将汇票出示并提交给受票人，要求承兑或付款的行为叫做提示。

synos.tran: （支票、汇票等的）[金融]付款人，[贸易]受票人

trans.tranCn: （支票、汇票等的）付款人，[贸易] 受票人
trans.tranOther: the person or organization on which a cheque or other order for payment is drawn
